episodes.title: Cult Leader or Messiah? Unveiling the Controversial Story of Apollo Quiboloy
episodes.description:
Explore the rise of Apollo Quiboloy, from humble beginnings in Davao to declaring himself the "Appointed Son of God." With millions of followers, Quiboloy’s influence spans faith, politics, and wealth. But dark allegations of abuse, trafficking, and corruption cast shadows on his legacy. Join Pinoy Pulse as we uncover the line between faith and power in this controversial story.

Like, subscribe, and stay tuned for more in-depth stories!
